U

updateById(Float, String, String, String) - Method in class com.hcl.currencyexchange.manager.DatabaseManager
This method is used to manually update the rate of a record from the currency_conversion table.
updateById(Float, String, String, String) - Method in class com.hcl.currencyexchange.restController.Controller
This method is used to handle the PUT request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/update URL by calling the updateById method from the DatabaseManager class.
updateRecord(float, LocalDate, String, String) - Method in interface com.hcl.currencyexchange.repository.ExchangeRepository
This method is used to update the rate of a specific record from the currency_conversion table.
